title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 54.5 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 54.5 - Fishing

State Regulations

Fishing in the Wetlands - Restricted Area and State

Wildlife Refuge - Posted portions of an Area is prohibited unless a valid
fishing permit is obtained. (a) Perch

River. Ice fishing on Perch Lake is permitted by day use permit only. Special
fishing permits are issued by the Regional Office of the Department of

Environmental Conservation, 317 Washington Street, Watertown, NY 13601. (1)

Access to Perch Lake is permitted from
designated fisher parking area only. (2)

Fishing is restricted to the lake proper. Entry onto adjacent upland and wetland is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
54.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
